abstract: The company has made a deal to buy 49 percent of a Russian television channel to introduce its brand to a country it views as an important untapped market.
snippet: The company has made a deal to buy 49 percent of a Russian television channel to introduce its brand to a country it views as an important untapped market.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — The Walt Disney Company on Thursday said it had completed a deal to introduce a nationally broadcast version of the Disney Channel in Russia, one of the world’s last big untapped entertainment markets.

headline.main: Disney Channel to Be Introduced in Russia
